attributes.action: Stop the future criminalisation of legitimate political parties, by the EU.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Under the 1999 ruling by the European Court of Justice.[c274/99].It was found that it was illegal to criticise the EU. Will the Prime minister, please ensure that once the 6th treaty is signed, the EU won`t start using its muscles in ways such as the banning of UKIP,BNP etc. This is for the political and social freedoms of everyone in "OUR" country.
